thread.title: TITUS TODD
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by TITUS TODD

author: TITUS TODD
title: TITUS TODD
text: I tried to use my $200 gift card from when I bought a bed from NFM a year ago but was told that it was expired and only good for 6 months. I planned to purchase some toys for my sons and myself. Initially I was super disappointed but purchased 3 Sony wireless headphones anyway. Brooke from customer service called and said she would just credit the account or mail the $200 gift card. She was very friendly and a pleasure to speak with. Thank you NFM and Brooke
